meanings.definition: The quality of being amusing or humorous in an odd or whimsical way.
meanings.sent1: Her drollnesses always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent2: The play was filled with drollnesses that kept the audience entertained.
meanings.sent3: The drollnesses of the clown made the children giggle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His drollnesses were like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The drollnesses of the comedian lingered in the air long after the show ended.

meanings.definition: Instances of being amusing or humorous in an odd or whimsical way.
meanings.sent1: The book was full of drollnesses that made it a joy to read.
meanings.sent2: We shared many drollnesses during our time together.
meanings.sent3: The drollnesses in the movie made us laugh until our stomachs hurt.
meanings.sent4: The drollnesses of life can be found in the most unexpected places.
meanings.sent5: His stories were filled with drollnesses that made them unforgettable.
